captions.text:
What time is it now?
Am I dreaming or awake?

The sketch in my head
I would've drawn her all night long

I'm going backwards
Far from the reality

As I approach her,
she goes to the land of stars

I'm so curious
The puzzling enigma

What is wrong with me
I'll say it like a man

It's a secret story
in my dream only I know

I invite her
My feelings for her, say!

It doesn't make sense
Right in front of my eyes
She is smiling

She appears in my dream
but disappears as I'm awake
I don't wanna let her go, say!
Confession Confession Confession Confession
Sleep talking

When I'm awake,
I still call your name
Talking Talking Talking Talking
Sleep talking

I'm going to see her
I'm sleepy again

Where are you?
You know how I feel?

I'm getting so frustrated
You don't understand

I can't even talk to you
I completely fell under your spell

The very reverse to what I dream
In here, I get to freeze

I'm so curious
The puzzling enigma

What is wrong with me
I'll say it like a man

It's a secret story
in my dream only I know

I invite her
My feelings for her, say!

It doesn't make sense
Right in front of my eyes
She is smiling

She appears in my dream
but disappears as I'm awake
I don't wanna let her go, say!
Confession Confession Confession Confession
Sleep talking

When I'm awake,
I still call your name
Talking Talking Talking Talking
Sleep talking

I'm going to see her
I'm sleepy again

Ay yo! NU'EST is back
on a duble-kick track
Make some noise

It doesn't make sense
Right in front of my eyes
She is smiling

She appears in my dream
but disappears as I'm awake
I don't wanna let her go, say!
Confession Confession Confession Confession
Sleep talking

When I'm awake,
I still call your name
Talking Talking Talking Talking
Sleep talking

I'm going to see her
I'm sleepy again
